isFluid.description: Whether or not the ListBox is 100% of its container's width.
isFluid.name: isFluid

isInvalid.description: Whether or not the ListBox is in an invalid state.
isInvalid.name: isInvalid

isLoading.description: Whether data is currently being loaded.
isLoading.name: isLoading

onLoadMore.description: Handler that is called when more items should be loaded, e.g. while scrolling near the bottom.
onLoadMore.name: onLoadMore

selectionIndicator.description:
The selection indicator to use. Only available if the selection mode is not "none".
When set to "input", the selection indicator will be an either a radio or checkbox based on the selection mode.
selectionIndicator.name: selectionIndicator

size.description: A ListBox can vary in size.
size.name: size

slot.description:
A slot name for the component. Slots allow the component to receive props from a parent component.
An explicit `null` value indicates that the local props completely override all props received from a parent.
slot.name: slot

style.description: The inline [style](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement/style) for the element. A function may be provided to compute the style based on component state.
style.name: style

selectionBehavior.description: How multiple selection should behave in the collection.
selectionBehavior.name: selectionBehavior

onAction.description:
Handler that is called when a user performs an action on an item. The exact user event depends on
the collection's `selectionBehavior` prop and the interaction modality.
onAction.name: onAction

autoFocus.description: Whether to auto focus the listbox or an option.
autoFocus.name: autoFocus

shouldFocusWrap.description: Whether focus should wrap around when the end/start is reached.
shouldFocusWrap.name: shouldFocusWrap

disabledKeys.description: The item keys that are disabled. These items cannot be selected, focused, or otherwise interacted with.
disabledKeys.name: disabledKeys

selectionMode.description: The type of selection that is allowed in the collection.
selectionMode.name: selectionMode

disallowEmptySelection.description: Whether the collection allows empty selection.
disallowEmptySelection.name: disallowEmptySelection

selectedKeys.description: The currently selected keys in the collection (controlled).
selectedKeys.name: selectedKeys

defaultSelectedKeys.description: The initial selected keys in the collection (uncontrolled).
defaultSelectedKeys.name: defaultSelectedKeys

onSelectionChange.description: Handler that is called when the selection changes.
onSelectionChange.name: onSelectionChange

onFocus.description: Handler that is called when the element receives focus.
onFocus.name: onFocus

onBlur.description: Handler that is called when the element loses focus.
onBlur.name: onBlur

onFocusChange.description: Handler that is called when the element's focus status changes.
onFocusChange.name: onFocusChange

aria-label.description: Defines a string value that labels the current element.
aria-label.name: aria-label

aria-labelledby.description: Identifies the element (or elements) that labels the current element.
aria-labelledby.name: aria-labelledby

aria-describedby.description: Identifies the element (or elements) that describes the object.
aria-describedby.name: aria-describedby

aria-details.description: Identifies the element (or elements) that provide a detailed, extended description for the object.
aria-details.name: aria-details

dragAndDropHooks.description: The drag and drop hooks returned by `useDragAndDrop` used to enable drag and drop behavior for the ListBox.
dragAndDropHooks.name: dragAndDropHooks

renderEmptyState.description: Provides content to display when there are no items in the list.
renderEmptyState.name: renderEmptyState

layout.description: Whether the items are arranged in a stack or grid.
layout.name: layout

orientation.description:
The primary orientation of the items. Usually this is the
direction that the collection scrolls.
orientation.name: orientation

dependencies.description: Values that should invalidate the item cache when using dynamic collections.
dependencies.name: dependencies

className.description: The CSS [className](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element/className) for the element. A function may be provided to compute the class based on component state.
className.name: className

onScroll.description: Handler that is called when a user scrolls. See [MDN](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element/scroll_event).
onScroll.name: onScroll

isFluid.name: isFluid

isInvalid.name: isInvalid
